ygData.msgSnippet: I ve got a few questions. first off, what was Gladiator written in? i figured something like c, or c++. secondly, is gladiator ever going to become abandonware

I've got a few questions. 
first off, what was Gladiator written in? i figured something like c, 
or c++.

secondly, is gladiator ever going to become abandonware or open 
source? because i would be really interested in the gladiator source 
code... just because its a really cool game.

and third, on sourceforge.net, theres a gladiator clone project, but 
it doesnt seem to be developing at all. anyone know anything about it?

thanks for your time.
